description:
Kling AI is a next-generation AI creative studio, highly praised by creators worldwide. Powered by Kling large model and Kolors large model, it enables video and image generation and editing. Here, you can unleash your imagination, or get inspired from fellow creators to bring your ideas to life.

Key features of Kling AI:
● AI video generation: Supports Text-to-Video and Image-to-Video generation. Simply input a text prompt or image, and watch your ideas come to life in high-quality video up to 1080P resolution. The video extension feature allows you to generate creative content up to 3 minutes long.
● AI image generation: Supports Text-to-Image and Image-to-Image generation. Generate creative images in various dimensions and styles from text prompts or reference images. You can also convert an image into a video effortlessly with a single click.
● Community: Browse works from other users for inspiration, and collaborate with well-known AI creators to spark new ideas.
● Clone & Try: Found your favorite image or video in the community? With a single click, you can clone the work and try out the amazing idea on your own.

What creators are saying:
● National TV director: "Kling AI’s understanding and simulations of physics impressed me, and perfectly recreated the organic look of handheld shots from classic films."
● Short film director: "Kling AI excels in range of motion and visual aesthetics. It's shaping the future of AI creation."
● Gaming studio lead artist: "Kling AI’s prompt understanding and concept integration are exceptional. It’s the most versatile DiT video generation model, and has significantly reduced cost in my production."
● Short video creator: "Kling AI is higher in quality, more stable, and able to generate content with longer duration. My content created with Kling AI brings great traction and engagement, with one video reaching 900,000 views."

Thank you for choosing Kling AI. For any inquiries or support, please contact us at: kling@kuaishou.com.

KlingAI Membership Service Terms

If you subscribe via Apple, payment will be charged to your App Store account upon purchase confirmation. The subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing cycle. Renewal fees will be charged to your account within 24 hours prior to the end of the current cycle at the applicable rate. You can manage your subscription and auto-renewal settings in the “Settings” section of your device after completing the purchase.
•	Service Agreement: https://ppg.kwai-pro.com/doodle/aDqchCbz.html		
•	Payment Agreement: https://ppg.kwai-pro.com/doodle/CfSAxMJH.html		
•	Privacy Policy: https://ppg.kwai-pro.com/doodle/hzUidQBb.html

ibis Paint X is a popular and versatile drawing app downloaded more than 460 million times in total as a series, which provides over 47000 brushes, over 27000 materials, over 2100 fonts,84 filters, 46 screentones, 27 blending modes, recording drawing processes, stroke stabilization feature, various ruler features such as radial line rulers or symmetry rulers, clipping mask features.

*YouTube channel
Many tutorial videos on ibis Paint are uploaded to our YouTube channel.
Subscribe it!
https://youtube.com/ibisPaint

*Concept/Features
- A Highly functional and professional features surpassing that of desktop drawing apps.
- Smooth and comfortable drawing experience realized by OpenGL technology.
- Recording your drawing process as a video.
- SNS feature where you can learn drawing techniques from other users' drawing process videos.

*Feedback from users
We receive many good reputations from users.
- I could have never assumed that I can draw such a beautiful drawings on smartphones!
- Easiest to use among all drawing apps!
- I have learned how to draw digital drawings without Mac or PC!

*Features
ibis Paint has high functionality as a drawing app along with features of sharing drawing processes with other users.

[Brush Features]
- Smooth drawing at up to 120 fps.
- Over 47000 kinds of brushes including dip pens, felt tip pens, digital pens, air brushes, fan brushes, flat brushes, pencils, oil brushes, charcoal brushes, crayons and stamps.

[Layer Features]
- You can add layers as many as you need with no limit.
- Layer parameters that can be set to each layers individually such as layer opacity, alpha blending, adding, subtracting, and multiplying.
- A handy clipping feature for clipping images, etc.
- Various layer commands such as layer duplication, import from the photo library, horizontal inversion, vertical inversion, layer rotation, layer moving, and zooming in/out.
- A feature for setting layer names to distinguish different layers.

[Manga Features]
- Advanced text tool function featuring Vertical, Horizontal, Stroke, Font select, and Multiple text functions.

*About ibis Paint purchase plan
The following purchase plans are available for ibis Paint:
- ibis Paint X (free version)
- ibis Paint (paid version)
- Remove Ads Add-on
- Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan)
There is no difference in features other than the presence or absence of advertisements for the paid version and the free version.
If you purchase the Remove Ads Add-on, the ads will not be displayed and there will be no difference from the paid version of ibis Paint.
In order to use more advanced functions, the following Prime Membership (Monthly plan / Yearly plan) contracts are required.

[Prime Membership]
A prime member can use the prime features. Only for the first time, a 7-day or 1-month free trial is available. Prime membership entitles you to the following features.
- 20GB of cloud storage capacity
- Vector tool(*1)
- Prime Materials
- Prime Canvas Papers
- Prime Fonts
- Tone Curve filter
- Gradation Map filter
- Levels Adjustment filter
- Prime Adjustment Layers
- Surrounding Fill・Surrounding Eraser
- AI Disturbance
- Artwork folder feature
- Import original brush patterns
- Remove watermark from videos
- No advertisements displayed
- Plus many other features exclusive to Prime Membership!
(*1) You can try it for free for up to 1 hour per day.
* After you become a Prime Membership with a free trial, renewal fee will be charged automatically unless you cancel your Prime Membership at least 24 hours before the end of the free trial period.
* We will add premium features in future, please look out for them.

*Questions and support
Questions and bug reports in reviews will not be responded to, so please contact ibis Paint support.
https://ssl.ibis.ne.jp/en/support/Entry?svid=25

*ibisPaint's terms of service
https://ibispaint.com/agreement.jsp

Yammi is next-generation video creation powered by AI. Create stunning videos in one click using ready-made templates and effects — perfect for social platforms. No editing skills required — just choose an effect, upload a photo, and Yammi does the rest.

For advanced users, we offer a range of video generation models — each suited for different purposes, from realistic animations to stylized effects. Choose the model that fits your needs and get exactly the result you’re looking for.

Why do people choose Yammi?

Powerful AI effects — Trendy templates and visual scenes that instantly grab attention.
Photo- or text-based generation — Upload an image or describe your idea and get a ready-made video.
Social-first orientation — Videos are perfectly optimized for social platforms.
Simplicity and speed — Everything works in one click, with no complex settings or learning curve.
Impressive quality — Sharp details, smooth animation, and realistic visuals.

Popular Templates and Effects
Yammi offers a library of visual effects and templates that instantly transform your photos and videos:

Flood — A massive wave suddenly crashes into the scene.
Revive old photos — Bring warm memories to life.
Portrait fire — Bright flames engulf a person in the photo.
Explosive destruction — Buildings blow up in the background, filling the frame with action.
Squishy — Fun, cartoon-style compression of objects.
Toy figure — Turn yourself into a toy-like figure.
Receiving flowers — A bouquet is handed to you right in your photo.
Hugs and kisses — Warm, romantic video scenes.
All effects are designed to make your videos go viral and rack up views.

How does Yammi work?

1. Choose a template or effect — Just tap to apply.
2. Or upload a photo / write text — Generate from scratch based on your idea.
3. Set the format — 9:16, 16:9, 1:1 and more.
4. Save and share — The final clip is ready to publish instantly.

Who is Yammi for?

Brands and marketers — For promos, stories, and viral content.
Everyday users — Just for fun and cool videos.
Creators and designers — For experimenting with AI-generated video.

No editing skills needed
Yammi is made for everyone — no special knowledge required. The interface is intuitive, and the generation process is as simple and fast as possible.

Subscription

Yammi Pro Weekly — Auto-renews every week
Yammi Pro Yearly — Affordable annual plan

Pricing depends on your country and local taxes. You can cancel your subscription in your Apple ID settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends.

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

AI Studio - AI Video Generator
Create AI Videos, Clips & Reels from Text or Images

Turn ideas into cinematic video content in seconds. No editing skills required.

AI Studio transforms a short prompt or reference images into a fully animated movie-style shot, perfect for UGC ads, promos, trailers, reels/shorts, tutorials, and social storytelling.

Powered by industry models
Built on Veo 3 & Veo 3.1 (Google DeepMind) and Sora 2 (OpenAI) via official APIs. Not affiliated, sponsored, or endorsed by Google or OpenAI.

What you can make
Text-to-Video: Describe a scene → get an animated clip.
Image-to-Video: Upload a still → generate realistic footage.
Reference-to-Video: Keep the same face/product/outfit/background across scenes with multi-image references.
Ad Factory: Brief → shot list → ready-to-publish UGC ad.
Fine Controls: Lock colors, camera, composition; exclude elements.
Aspect Ratios: 9:16 (vertical), 16:9 (landscape).
Quality & Formats: Up to 1080p exports, no watermark.
Brand-safe Exports: Designed for TikTok, Reels, Shorts, YouTube.

Great for: social posts, promo clips, product demos, ad creatives, logo stingers, explainers, movie-style trailers, experimental AI video art.

How it works
Pick a model (e.g., Veo Fast/Pro, Sora Fast/Pro).
Enter a prompt and optionally add reference images.
Preview settings (length, aspect, audio) and see required credits before you generate.
Render your movie-style clip and export.
Typical length per generation: 4–12 seconds (model-dependent).
Create longer pieces by stitching multiple shots/clips.

Credits, Costs & Plans
Credits required per generation depend on model, duration, and quality.
The credit cost is shown upfront before you hit generate.
Choose pay-as-you-go credit packs or auto-renewing subscriptions.
One-time credit packs: e.g., 60 / 150 / 450 / 1000 /2150 credits.
Weekly subscriptions: e.g., 60 / 100 / 150 / 250 / 350 / 450 / 750 credits.
Monthly subscriptions: e.g., 150 / 250 / 350 / 450 / 600 / 900 / 1000 / 2150 credits.
 
Auto-renewal: Subscriptions renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the period ends. Your iTunes account is charged at purchase and within 24 hours of renewal.

Rollover: Unused credits continue to roll over while your subscription stays active.
Refunds: Handled by Apple under Apple’s policies.

Legal & Disclaimers
Model access: The app connects to third-party generative models (including Veo 3/Veo 3.1 and Sora 2) via our servers. This is not an official Google or OpenAI product.

Affiliation: Not owned by, endorsed by, or affiliated with Google, Google DeepMind, OpenAI, or their affiliates. We participate in Google for Startups.

Support


Questions or feedback? hello@aivideomaker.app
Apple EULA: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Explore our enormous collection of stylish icons, themes, wallpapers, and widgets! You’re free to jazz up your phone’s Lock & Home Screens to your taste.


And it's not just about the look. With Themify widgets for Lock & Home screens and StandBy, you can keep the info you need handy, turn your phone into a smart display, and even have a digital pet right on your screen!


COMPLETE MAKEOVER of your device!

Themify gives you a wide range of tools to express yourself. With our app, you're free to customize your phone to your liking. Enjoy state-of-the-art content and unleash your creativity!

Key features:


■ 3-in-1 Themes


Whether you love dark hues or you’re a diehard pastel fan, you can decorate your screen to create a harmonious space! Install a theme that suits your taste, and watch your app icons, widgets, and wallpapers come together seamlessly.


■ Vast Widget Collection
Interactive widgets to track activities that are important to you, e.g., sleep or steps
Widgets with time & calendar, weather, inspiring quotes, or just eye-pleasing pics—add any info right to your Home & Lock Screens
Cute digital pets (remember to feed and bathe them!)
Widgets for StandBy with always-on time, date, or real-time weather
Informative widgets created especially for iPad

■ Theme Maker

If you’d like to add a personal touch to your Home Screen theme, use our Theme Maker. Feel completely free to change whatever you want and create a one-of-a-kind design for your device.


■ 2000+ Icon Packs


For those who are bored with the same standard app icons, we have an array of custom icon packs. You'll surely find content that resonates with your unique taste!


■ Live and Still Wallpapers

Anime, Urban, Animals, Nature, Cars, just to name a few—we have still and live wallpapers for every taste and mood! With Themify, you're entirely free to choose any wallpaper that perfectly suits your vibe.


■ Apple Health Integration 


Sync Themify with the Health app and effortlessly track your daily sleep, steps, and water intake from convenient and stylish widgets. 

UNLIMITED ACCESS MEMBERSHIP SUBSCRIPTION
• You can subscribe to all features within Themify for unlimited access.
• Subscriptions are billed weekly or annually at the rate selected depending on the subscription plan.

Collaborate on the go. View, share, and mirror designs with just a few taps. With Figma’s official mobile app, you can:

REVIEW YOUR FILES
* Access Figma, FigJam, Prototype and Slides files.
* Quickly search for files by name or browse your recently viewed files.
* Navigate between pages and flows in any file.

CREATE AND REPLY TO COMMENTS
* Add comments and mention teammates anywhere in a file.
* Get notified for new comments and replies.
* Resolve and respond to comments on the go.
* View a list of all comment threads in a file.

SHARE FILES WITH YOUR TEAM
* Invite collaborators and share links to your files.

PLAY YOUR PROTOTYPES
* Play and replay prototypes in full screen.
* Adjust prototype scaling.
* Toggle hotspot hints.

MIRROR DESIGNS IN REAL-TIME
* Sync selected frames from desktop to your mobile device.
* Watch real-time edits to your designs on your mobile device.
* Preview how assets in your design look scaled to a device screen.

EXPLORE SLIDES EFFORTLESSLY
* View and comment on decks in both landscape and portrait mode.

MANAGE PERMISSIONS ON THE FLY
* Update file permissions to control who can view or edit your work.

BROWSE AND SWITCH WORKSPACES AND ACCOUNTS
* Navigate between teams, plans, projects, and accounts.

On iPad, you can also use FigJam to:
* Sketch with the Apple Pencil to explore and iterate on ideas more fluidly.
* Share and riff on early thinking with your team.
* Annotate designs to share feedback.
* Jot down ideas whenever inspiration strikes.

HOME PLANNER: THE ULTIMATE HOUSE DESIGN AND RENOVATION APP

Bring your dream space to life with Home Planner, the ultimate app for design and renovation enthusiasts. Fish Hunter is your ultimate fishing companion. Fish Hunter is a complete fishing app designed for anglers of all skill levels who want to track their catches, discover new fishing spots, and stay up to date with the latest in the fishing world. Document every memorable catch with detailed photos, location data, and fishing conditions to build your own personal trophy collection. Save and organize your favorite fishing spots, notes, and your own ratings so you never forget great spots again. Get instant access to the latest fishing news, technique coverage, gear reviews, location guides, rule updates, and inspiring stories from the fishing community. Communicate with our cutting-edge AI-powered fishing assistant for personalized advice on gear selection, fishing techniques, weather conditions, and local regulations. The app features a beautiful, intuitive interface with smooth animations and a customizable tab bar that makes navigation easy. Track weather conditions, water temperature, and moon phases for each catch to identify patterns and improve your fishing success over time. Create detailed fishing reports with multiple photos, species information, weight, length, and location data. Discover hidden fishing gems with curated location guides and community recommendations. Stay up-to-date on fishing regulations and license requirements in your area to fish responsibly and legally. The app works offline to log your catch, so you can document your fishing adventures even in remote locations without cell service. Join thousands of anglers who trust Fish Hunter to enhance their fishing experience and preserve their fishing memories forever.

The AR Drawing by Tayasui app is an invaluable tool for artists looking to trace and sketch various designs. It provides an efficient and user-friendly platform for creating drawing and sketch art. With its step-by-step drawing lessons and the ability to trace selected images using tracing paper under the camera, it's an excellent resource for learning and practicing the art of tracing. Transforming sketches into art is made easy by using AR Drawing by Tayasui app to trace images, whether it's cartoons, buildings, objects, or eyes, onto tracing paper.

Using this you may learn and practice drawing. Also make tracing an image easy. Just select an image from the app or gallery apply filter to create image traceable. The image will appear on screen with camera open. Place phone about 1feet above and look into the phone and draw on paper.

The user can adjust the thickness and style of their lines, as well as use the eraser tool to correct any mistakes. They can also add additional elements or details to their sketch if desired. Once the user has finished their sketch, they can save it or share it with others. The app may also have features such as filters or color adjustments to further enhance the finished sketch.
